roleset.name: summon to a cause
roleset.note: RALLY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rally' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No relevant verbnet entry (VN class nonvehicle-51.4.2). No comparison. (from rally.01-v)
RALLY-N NOTES: Roleset based on rally.01. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie. (from rally.01-n)

example.name: rally 'round the flag
example.text: Charles Wohlstetter, the chairman of Contel Corp. who *trace* is rallying other CEOs to the anti-program trading cause...

example.name: Example of arg 2
example.text: activists threatened further rallies against leader Krenz 's expected hard-line policies
example.arg: against leader Krenz 's expected hard-line policies

example.name: Example of arg 1
example.text: a rally of what can only be called the Korotich party
example.arg: of what can only be called the Korotich party

example.name: Arg 2 where you may be tempted to use arg 0 (but Nader is the reason to come together, people gather to support him rather than him calling evenryone together)
example.text: A Nader rally in Madison Square Garden

roleset.name: (cause to) suddenly show better performance

example.name: ergative
example.text: Stock prices rallied in active trading .

example.name: quantifiable? apparently
example.text: Elsewhere in the oil sector, Exxon rallied 7/8 to 45 3/4.

example.text: The main catalyst for government bond market rally
